attributes.action: Let Dover Kent Have The George Cross As Did Malta After WW2
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For over three thousand years Dover has stood as the front line of this Great Britain.   Who can honestly say that it does not deserve the recognition it has earned with its strength and courage through wars, disasters and all the trials and tribulations of this countries long history?   Malta and its people were awarded the George Cross after WW2. The land army is just now being awarded a medal for there Contribution and many of these Girls Lived in Dover

rejection.details: Self-nominations are not allowed. Also, there is a 5 year rule that demands that any evaluation process be concluded within 5 years of the specific event upon which the nomination is made. We would advise you to contact the Cermeonial Secretariat of the Cabinet Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
